AboutPage.AboutParagraph: I'm a mobile application developer with a passion for creating innovative and user-friendly experiences. I have been working in the field for 2 years, and my primary expertise lies in developing mobile applications using the Flutter framework.

Projects.title: Let's do it!
Projects.Description: To-Do App is a flutter-based mobile application developed to help people to track their daily tasks and accomplish them within a deadline.

Projects.title: Helping Hands
Projects.Description: ‘Helping Hands’ application is a step for the betterment of the world with easy steps involved. It is a completely fledged application with functionalities including placing orders, waiting for confirmation, and making the user experience immersive and fruitful to help people in need of food.

Projects.title: World Time
Projects.Description: World Time app is based on the Flutter framework developed to learn Flutter. It uses real-time API to display the current time of various world locations.

Projects.title: Quick Note
Projects.Description: 'Quick Note' is a mobile application based on Flutter to make quick notes of daily tasks, events, etc.

Projects.title: Instagram Clone
Projects.Description: Instagram-Clone front-end is developed using React Native framework to explore various aspects of React Native cross-platform development.

Projects.title: B.Tech. Computer Science Notes
Projects.Description: This repository is created in order to share the resources of all the subjects related to Computer Science and Engineering.
